EnemyInfo.Name: Eye
EnemyInfo.Description: Eye that shines a scanning beam towards samus when in range. The enemy is normally in two parts. They must be consecutive with the mount part being before the eye part. Only one set will work correctly in a room.

Property.Name: Eye Direction
Property.Description: Direction of the eye. Parameter is ignored if the enemy is a mount.

Property.Name: PLMs to activate
Property.Description: Will activate the first N PLMs in the room once scan is completed.

Property.Name: Mount Direction
Property.Description: Direction of the mount. Parameter is ignored if the enemy is an eye.
